billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Authorizes Westchester county to require local marinas provide for watercraft holding tank sewage disposal; prohibits littering of waterways
summary: Authorizes Westchester county to require that local marinas provide for the handling and disposal of sewage from watercraft holding tanks; directs the department of environmental conservation to request, from the federal environmental protection agency, a "no-discharge zone" designation of waters within the marine jurisdictional boundaries of Westchester county.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
